tip.lazyMode:
Normal mode: Use other operators to speed up first when training this skill to Specialization Level 1 or 2, and then switch to Irene to work for 5 hours.

Lazy mode: Use Irene for the whole process when training this skill to Specialization Level 1 or 2, and then switch to other operators to complete Specialization Level 3.
tip.swapIrene: Please always switch to Irene a few minutes early to avoid Irene working less than 5 hours.
